title: Letting Go
description:
Are you ready to let go?

Talking Points

  • The feeling of letting go
  • Re-evaluating your choices amid the pandemic
  • Spring cleaning different aspects of your life
  • Questioning whether you need all of the things you have
  • Emotional and mental letting go
  • Reframing your ideas and routines
  • Cutting little anchors while bigger roots help to ground you
  • Giving yourself an alternative dialogue
  • Doing the things that you’ve been thinking about

Related Links:

Your Money or Your Life


Quotable Quotes

“When it really came down to it and I’m staring at four 7-foot trophies—do I really want these in the house?” –JS

“How much better is it to do it not when your money changes, but when you change?” –RM

“I generally prefer when I’m less anchored down.” –JS

“It’s the idea that you can do things differently and that is good.” –RM
author: jstark@jonathanstark.com (Jonathan Stark and Rochelle Moulton)
